sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.IndicatorNotificationSubscriber</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Supports Email summary notifications in Performance Analytics.</description>
        <name>IndicatorNotificationSubscriber</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var IndicatorNotificationSubscriber = Class.create();
IndicatorNotificationSubscriber.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	canSubscribe: function(notification) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("pa_m2m_indicator_notification_users");
		gr.addQuery("notification", notification.sys_id);
		gr.addQuery("user", gs.getUserID());
		gr.query();
		return !gr.hasNext();
	},

    type: 'IndicatorNotificationSubscriber'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-11-28 16:11:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>24866082bf11110032a0854b3f073965</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>IndicatorNotificationSubscriber</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">97a305876da620100acb70b353433004</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_24866082bf11110032a0854b3f073965</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-03-13 14:24:13</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>424</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
